mb.gloss: a unit of information equal to 1000 kilobits or 10^6 (1,000,000) bits
a unit of information equal to 1000 kilobytes or 10^6 (1,000,000) bytes
a unit of information equal to 1024 kibibytes or 2^20 (1,048,576) bytes
(a British degree) a bachelor's degree in medicine

mbd.gloss: a condition (mostly in boys) characterized by behavioral and learning disorders

mbit.gloss: a unit of information equal to 1000 kilobits or 10^6 (1,000,000) bits

mbundu.gloss: an ethnic group speaking Umbundu and living in western Angola
